CustomField.description: IF(AND(SBQQ__Quote__r.Specific_Transportation__c = True,OR( LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "75", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "77", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "78", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "91", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "92", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "93", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "94", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "95")),"IDF", IF(OR( LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "59", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "27", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "76"),"Région Nord / Normandie", IF(LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "31","Région Centre / Aquitaine / Midi Pyrénées", IF(LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2) = "21","Région Est", IF(LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2)="69","Région Rhônes Alpes", IF(LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c,2)="20","Corse","France"))))))
CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(SBQQ__Quote__r.Specific_Transportation__c = True,NOT(ISBLANK(Tech_Region_QL__c))), Tech_Region_QL__c, IF ( OR( LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "75", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "77", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "78", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "91", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "92", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "93", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "94", LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "95" ) , "IDF" , IF ( LEFT(QL_CP_Tech__c ,2) = "20" , "Corse" , "France")
) )
CustomField.label: Shipping Area
